ygData.subject: RE: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ooops, forgot the Healing aspect.  Identical in numerics to Hymm.  However it is applied will be a different story. (It could have a very low fixed
ygData.messageBody:
> For all purposes, this new song resemebles the Enchanter
> Berserker Strength spell across all party members.
> It has half the range of Selo's Accelerando, and slightly
> more range than Hymm, and close to equal range of Chant of Battle.

Ooops, forgot the Healing aspect. Identical in numerics
to Hymm. However it is applied will be a different story.
(It could have a very low fixed ceiling, as could all the
effects in this description) I'm not sure how bardic level
will influence this song, but since it's L47 I doubt the
effects will increase much in 3 levels. Just pure speculation
and assumption on my part based on the data file. I'd hate
to say this is anything more than an educated guess.

Harmonic 8)
